title: Schitt's Creek Mens' Cast Shocked Couch Family Photo Graphic T-Shirt
features: This black tee features a front brightly colored family photo of the Rose family, with less than happy expressions.
Crewneck tee with short sleeves and a tagless neckline for comfortable wear
Easy care; machine wash cold, dry low
Listed in men's sizes but can be worn by women looking for that boyfriend style top
description: Schitt's Creek is a hilarious Canadian sitcom that will keep you laughing with lovable characters and a great storyline. The show revolves around a family that loses their fortune and is forced to move to a small town that is anything but the luxurious life the Rose family is used to. This white tee features a front brightly colored family photo of the Rose family, with less than happy expressions. This tee is made of 100% Cotton and is tagless for added comfort. This is a great shirt for any fan of this sitcom. Show your Schitt's Creek pride in this shirt. Makes a great gift too.
